transcript:
Customer: Ji sir ji, call drop, call drop kar jati hai kai baar yaha pe na Jio ke network mein problem hai.

Customer: Aise ji isme steel to dalte hai na? To steel nahi aayega, steel aayega. Jaise 800 series. Ya toh.
Customer: To expanders 800 series, sahi hai? Achcha. Series different photo actually yahi cheez ka hi hai.
Customer: Ab isme agar aapke categories kya hai aapke paas mein koi chakkar nahi padegi. Dekh lijiye. Dekh lijiye ek baar.
Customer: Chal ye hang kyun aa ja raha hai IndiaMART ko?
Customer: Ye click nahi ho raha hai kya add more? Hmm.
Customer: Kuch refresh. Refresh kariye. Aisa hota toh nahi hai.
Customer: Jaise karway steel boiler cleaning brushes, ye bhi iske andar rehta hai. Boiler cleaning brushes mein toh category mein aani nahi hai meri yaar. Jaise isme samajh lijiye aap, aapko mana kare mere liye.
Customer: Ah, haan, ye iske liye best option hai. Khud ke boiler cleaning brushes.
Customer: Aaye haye haye.
Customer: Isme jaise price thoda bahut upar down kar sakte hai apan, ye bhi. Haan, aap mere hisab se kar sakte ho.
Customer: Aur isme steel steel nahi aayega mera abhi mujhe.
Customer: Aur ye kya wapis upar nahi ja raha hai, ye hang kyun ho raha hai yaar ye IndiaMART?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART hang nahi kar raha hoga, laptop kar raha hoga. Mera toh badhiya chal raha hai ekdum. Laptop ye dekhiye, laptop ye badhiya chal raha hai mera bhi. Yaha pe nahi chal raha hai ye achche.
Customer: Achche achche.
Customer: Hmm yaar. Sir hota toh nahi hai. Bill pay karo yaar IndiaMART walon ko bolo bill pay kare.
Customer: Haha.
Customer: Server uska bill pay karao yaar.
Customer: Hmm. Abhi steel steel bolne nahi hai. Ye ye meri samajh mein boiler to responding boiler to responding machine nahi aayega, CSB series boiler ye series boiler to responding machine aa gaya ye three haan. Ye lag gaya sahi hai na? Are yaar kitna sahi yaar.
Customer: Bearing boiler to clean to expanders.
Customer: Isme apan price bhi thoda bada sakte hai, kitna kaise mein dal dega. Ah ha.
Customer: GST ke saath included rehta hai kya sir price? Ye cheez ye cheez Modi ji ka paisa matlab free rehta hai sir. Achcha theek hai sir. Modi ji ko paisa hum baad mein alag se dete hai sir. Aise hogi nahi hum log.

Customer: Usme 800 series agar isko apan 900 series bhi kar sakte hai to expanders. Haan ye five series bhi kar sakte hai apan isko.
Customer: Ye wapis hang ho gaya. Ye hang kyun ho raha hai bas aaj?
Executive: Hmm. Hang waise basically hota nahi hai sir. Matlab kisi bhi client ke saath maine meeting kari hai. Ah, aisa wo kya kehte hai cookies wookies clear karna ho might be. Kuch kuch toh hota hai. Na ka coffee kam ki. Subah toh khai thi.

Customer: Cookies delete browsing data. Aaye all time. All time. Baaki ko chhod do. HD mein jis se download history please. Aise chhodna padega kya karna padega.
Customer: Ye ye bhi gaddi sab ye. Pura hi hat gaya sir. Wo shayad. Nahi hata na? Hata hai. Are nahi matlab band ho gaya. Main dekh nahi pa raha screen. Rukiye rukiye rukiye jab ki presenting hai.

Customer: Presenting hai? Are wo wahi kuch hua hoga sir jaise pura settings pe humne apply kiya na uss cheezon ko. Hmm hmm hmm. To kaam ye karna ki ek baar aap stop sharing karke fir se matlab reload karna padega ek baar. Haan haan wahi wahi.



Customer: Haan. Matlab ye please ye aa gayi link. Joining ka. Getting ready. Hmm. Switch here.



Customer: Got it. To matlab kya baat hai sir. Sab kuch lagao theek kar diya usne.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing hanging issue on IndiaMART.

- Unable to add steel category.

- Wants to know if GST is included in price.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested to refresh the page.

- Executive suggested to clear cookies.

- Executive guided to stop and restart presenting.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- hanging issue, categories, gst, price
